sentences.en: Check the presentation. Get it properly laid out with a title page.
sentences.cn: 检查一下外观，保证有扉页和合适的版式。

sentences.en: desktop devices for the presentation of information
sentences.cn: 显示信息用的桌面设备

sentences.en: Dr Evans thanked him for coming to make the presentations .
sentences.cn: 埃文斯博士感谢他来颁奖。

sentences.en: He received his award at a presentation in London yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天，他在伦敦的颁奖典礼上领了奖。

sentences.en: His presentation was clear and incisive.
sentences.cn: 他的报告清晰而犀利.

sentences.en: I’m going to ask each of you to make a short presentation.
sentences.cn: 我要请你们每一位作一个简短的介绍。

sentences.en: James Watson, Philip Mayo and I gave a slide and video presentation.
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯·沃森、菲利普·梅奥和我一起做了一场有幻灯和录像片的讲座。

sentences.en: Last week we went to the presentation of a new play.
sentences.cn: 上星期我们去观看了一场新剧的演出.

sentences.en: On presentation of the relevant identity documents you may collect your property.
sentences.cn: 你只要出示有关的身份证件就可以领取你的财产.

sentences.en: She is meticulous in her presentation of facts.
sentences.cn: 她介绍事实十分详细.

sentences.en: The ideas in the show's presentation were good, but failed in execution.
sentences.cn: 那场展览陈述的想法很好，但是没能实现。

sentences.en: The manner of presentation is highly important.
sentences.cn: 介绍的方式很重要.

sentences.en: the presentation ceremony
sentences.cn: 颁奖仪式

sentences.en: The presentation of food can be as important as the taste.
sentences.cn: 食物的外观和味道同样重要.

sentences.en: The president made a presentation to the businesswoman of the year.
sentences.cn: 总统为本年度最成功的女实业家颁发了奖品.

sentences.en: The Queen will make the presentation herself.
sentences.cn: 女王将亲手赠送礼品.

sentences.en: The trial was adjourned following the presentation of new evidence to the court.
sentences.cn: 新证据呈到庭上后，审讯就宣告暂停。

sentences.en: Then came the presentation of the awards by the Queen Mother.
sentences.cn: 然后由王太后颁奖。

sentences.en: There is a presentation of a new play tonight.
sentences.cn: 今晚有一场新戏演出.

sentences.en: We serve traditional French food cooked in a lighter way, keeping the presentation simple.
sentences.cn: 我们供应制作清淡、样式简洁的传统法国菜肴。

sentences.en: We will begin a series of presentations to help the public fully understand our system.
sentences.cn: 我们将进行一系列的说明，帮助公众充分了解我们的制度。

words.tran_cn: 表象的；演出的；上演的；直觉的
提出者；推荐者；赠送者；任命者

phrases.tran_cn: 口头报告；口头陈述；口头演讲
n. 演讲技巧；表达技巧

trans.tran_cn: 授予，提出…的方式，颁奖仪式，介绍，表演，胎儿产式
trans.tran_en: an event at which you describe or explain a new product or idea
